channel.title: Minecraft v1.0.0
channel.description: I updated my Minecraft today and was playing with all the new stuff. Just wondering when the server will be updated or will I have to roll back? I enjoy the server and the work done, Thanks guys.

item.title: Minecraft v1.0.0
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

[quote=“Domo_Master, post:6, topic:422124”]Wen will u update[/quote]wtf the answer is in this topic…

item.title: Minecraft v1.0.0
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:4, topic:422124”][quote author=zuppers link=topic=524802.msg3820047#msg3820047 date=1321683209]

Same as every update, whenever bukkit releases a recommended version, and all the plugins we use are updated to be compatible with that version, then we can update.

So until then, I would go ahead and roll back your client version.

offtopic:
I explored world 2 a little yesterday, and I have to say your island is the most amazing thing I’ve ever seen. You are definitely in the ranks of vizard and corey as the best builders on this server.
[/quote]I saw it too and was impressed but then instantly sad that I lost my island.

That was your island?[/quote]Talking about my old place.

Read full topic

Same as every update, whenever bukkit releases a recommended version, and all the plugins we use are updated to be compatible with that version, then we can update.

So until then, I would go ahead and roll back your client version.

That was your island?
